column4: Compact in size，Easily operation & easy control，Plug and play design, compatible for mainstream models，Up to 7.4kW of output power，Preset charging power & delay charging time by just one touch，OLED screen & status indication: power, connection, charging and malfunction，Residual current protection: Type A + DC6mA，Over current, over voltage, under voltage, surge, short circuit, ground fault, over temperature, leakage protections, relay sticking detection
